sections.paragraph: + The father of Hadadezer king of Zobah, whom David smote at the Euphrates. (2 Samuel 8:3,12) (B.C. before 1043.) + A Levite or family of Levites who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah. (Nehemiah 10:11) (B.C. 410.) + The northern limit of the exploration of the spies. (Numbers 13:21) Robinson fixes the position of Rehob as not far from Tell el-Kady and Banias . + One of the towns allotted to Asher. (Joshua 19:28) + Asher contained another Rehob, (Joshua 19:30) but the situation of these towns is unknown.
